92 #include <explore/explore.h>

95 
96 // Counter fuer Explore_Ende
97 int count_soar = 0;
99 inline static bool operator==(const geometry_msgs::Point& one,
100  const geometry_msgs::Point& two)
101 {
102  double dx = one.x - two.x;
103  double dy = one.y - two.y;
104  double dist = sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
105  return dist < 0.01;
106 }
107 
108 namespace explore
109 {
110 Explore::Explore()
111  : private_nh_("~")
112  , tf_listener_(ros::Duration(10.0))
113  , costmap_client_(private_nh_, relative_nh_, &tf_listener_)
114  , move_base_client_("move_base")
115  , prev_distance_(0)
116  , last_markers_count_(0)
117 {
118  double timeout;
119  double min_frontier_size;
120  private_nh_.param("planner_frequency", planner_frequency_, 1.0);
121  private_nh_.param("progress_timeout", timeout, 30.0);
122  progress_timeout_ = ros::Duration(timeout);
123  private_nh_.param("visualize", visualize_, false);
124  private_nh_.param("potential_scale", potential_scale_, 1e-3);
125  private_nh_.param("orientation_scale", orientation_scale_, 0.0);
126  private_nh_.param("gain_scale", gain_scale_, 1.0);
127  private_nh_.param("min_frontier_size", min_frontier_size, 0.5);
128 
129  search_ = frontier_exploration::FrontierSearch(costmap_client_.getCostmap(),
130  potential_scale_, gain_scale_,
131  min_frontier_size);
132 
133  if (visualize_) {
134  marker_array_publisher_ =
135  private_nh_.advertise<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>("frontiers", 10);
136  }
137 
138  ROS_INFO("Waiting to connect to move_base server");
139  move_base_client_.waitForServer();
140  ROS_INFO("Connected to move_base server");
141 
142  exploring_timer_ =
143  relative_nh_.createTimer(ros::Duration(1. / planner_frequency_),
144  [this](const ros::TimerEvent&) { makePlan(); });
145 }
146 
147 Explore::~Explore()
148 {
149  ROS_INFO("In deconstructor!");
150  //stop();
151 }
152 
153 void Explore::visualizeFrontiers(
154  const std::vector<frontier_exploration::Frontier>& frontiers)
155 {
156  std_msgs::ColorRGBA blue;
157  blue.r = 0;
158  blue.g = 0;
159  blue.b = 1.0;
160  blue.a = 1.0;
161  std_msgs::ColorRGBA red;
162  red.r = 1.0;
163  red.g = 0;
164  red.b = 0;
165  red.a = 1.0;
166  std_msgs::ColorRGBA green;
167  green.r = 0;
168  green.g = 1.0;
169  green.b = 0;
170  green.a = 1.0;
171 
172  ROS_DEBUG("visualising %lu frontiers", frontiers.size());
173  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray markers_msg;
174  std::vector<visualization_msgs::Marker>& markers = markers_msg.markers;
175  visualization_msgs::Marker m;
176 
177  m.header.frame_id = costmap_client_.getGlobalFrameID();
178  m.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
179  m.ns = "frontiers";
180  m.scale.x = 1.0;
181  m.scale.y = 1.0;
182  m.scale.z = 1.0;
183  m.color.r = 0;
184  m.color.g = 0;
185  m.color.b = 255;
186  m.color.a = 255;
187  // lives forever
188  m.lifetime = ros::Duration(0);
189  m.frame_locked = true;
190 
191  // weighted frontiers are always sorted
192  double min_cost = frontiers.empty() ? 0. : frontiers.front().cost;
193 
194  m.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
195  size_t id = 0;
196  for (auto& frontier : frontiers) {
197  m.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::POINTS;
198  m.id = int(id);
199  m.pose.position = {};
200  m.scale.x = 0.1;
201  m.scale.y = 0.1;
202  m.scale.z = 0.1;
203  m.points = frontier.points;
204  if (goalOnBlacklist(frontier.centroid)) {
205  m.color = red;
206  } else {
207  m.color = blue;
208  }
209  markers.push_back(m);
210  ++id;
211  m.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::SPHERE;
212  m.id = int(id);
213  m.pose.position = frontier.initial;
214  // scale frontier according to its cost (costier frontiers will be smaller)
215  double scale = std::min(std::abs(min_cost * 0.4 / frontier.cost), 0.5);
216  m.scale.x = scale;
217  m.scale.y = scale;
218  m.scale.z = scale;
219  m.points = {};
220  m.color = green;
221  markers.push_back(m);
222  ++id;
223  }
224  size_t current_markers_count = markers.size();
225 
226  // delete previous markers, which are now unused
227  m.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::DELETE;
228  for (; id < last_markers_count_; ++id) {
229  m.id = int(id);
230  markers.push_back(m);
231  }
232 
233  last_markers_count_ = current_markers_count;
234  marker_array_publisher_.publish(markers_msg);
235 }
236 
237 
238 
239 void Explore::makePlan()
240 {
241  costmap_2d::Costmap2D* costmap2d = costmap_client_.getCostmap(); // SOA we copied this to print out frontier size in correct dimension
242 
243  // find frontiers
244  auto pose = costmap_client_.getRobotPose();
245  // get frontiers sorted according to cost
246  auto frontiers = search_.searchFrom(pose.position);
247  ROS_DEBUG("found %lu frontiers", frontiers.size());
248  for (size_t i = 0; i < frontiers.size(); ++i) {
249  ROS_DEBUG("frontier %zd cost: %f", i, frontiers[i].cost);
250  ROS_DEBUG("frontier %zd size: %f", i, frontiers[i].size * costmap2d->getResolution());
251  }
252 
253  if (frontiers.empty()) {
254  ROS_INFO("Frontier list is empty");
255  stop();
256  return;
257  }
258 
259  // publish frontiers as visualization markers
260  if (visualize_) {
261  visualizeFrontiers(frontiers);
262  }
263 
264  // find non blacklisted frontier
265  auto frontier =
266  std::find_if_not(frontiers.begin(), frontiers.end(),
267  [this](const frontier_exploration::Frontier& f) {
268  return goalOnBlacklist(f.centroid);
269  });
270  if (frontier == frontiers.end()) {
271  ROS_INFO("Only blacklisted frontiers");
272  bool reset = false;
273 
274  for(int i=0; i < frontiers.size(); i++){
275  if(frontiers[i].size > 10/costmap2d->getResolution() ||
276  (frontiers[i].centroid.x > 0 && frontiers[i].centroid.x < 1) && (frontiers[i].centroid.y > -6.5 && frontiers[i].centroid.y < -5.5) ||
277  (frontiers[i].centroid.x > -1 && frontiers[i].centroid.x < 0) && (frontiers[i].centroid.y > 5.5 && frontiers[i].centroid.y < 6.5))
278  {
279  ROS_INFO("Sind in der if abfrage drinnen! Wir Resetten nichtmehr sondern sind fertig!");
280  // reset = false;
281  }
282  else{
283  ROS_INFO("Sind in der if abfrage drinnen! reset = true");
284  reset = true;
285  }
286  }
287  if((reset == true) && (count_soar < 5)){
288  frontier_blacklist_.clear();
289  ROS_INFO("Clear it and let's do it again!");
290  count_soar++;
291  ROS_INFO("Abbruch count: ");
292  std::cout << count_soar << std::endl;
293  makePlan();
294  return;
295  }
296  else{
297  ROS_INFO("Stop because reset false && cound_soar ");
298  std::cout <<"Reset = "<<reset<<" |||| count = "<< count_soar << std::endl;
299  stop();
300  return;
301  }
302  return;
303  }
304  geometry_msgs::Point target_position = frontier->centroid;
305 
306  // time out if we are not making any progress
307  bool same_goal = prev_goal_ == target_position;
308  prev_goal_ = target_position;
309  if (!same_goal || prev_distance_ > frontier->min_distance) {
310  // we have different goal or we made some progress = come closer to goal but on a luftline direction
311  last_progress_ = ros::Time::now();
312  prev_distance_ = frontier->min_distance;
313  }
314  // SOA function to blacklist frontiers out of the maze
315  if (target_position.x > 5.8 || target_position.y > 5.8 || target_position.x < -5.8 || target_position.y < -5.8)
316  {
317  frontier_blacklist_.push_back(target_position);
318  ROS_INFO("#");
319  ROS_INFO("#");
320  ROS_INFO(" XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX Frontier out of the Maze");
321  ROS_INFO("#");
322  ROS_INFO("#");
323  makePlan();
324  return;
325  }
326  if (frontier->size > 10/costmap2d->getResolution())
327  {
328  frontier_blacklist_.push_back(target_position);
329  ROS_INFO("#");
330  ROS_INFO("#");
331  ROS_INFO(" ###################### Frontier to Size to big");
332  ROS_INFO("#");
333  ROS_INFO("#");
334  makePlan();
335  return;
336  }
337  if ((target_position.x > 0 && target_position.x < 1) && (target_position.y > -6.5 && target_position.y < -5.5))
338  {
339  frontier_blacklist_.push_back(target_position);
340  ROS_INFO("#");
341  ROS_INFO("#");
342  ROS_INFO(" ###################### Frontier was 0.5, -6 exit");
343  ROS_INFO("#");
344  ROS_INFO("#");
345  makePlan();
346  return;
347  }
348  if ((target_position.x > -1 && target_position.x < 0) && (target_position.y > 5.5 && target_position.y < 6.5))
349  {
350  frontier_blacklist_.push_back(target_position);
351  ROS_INFO("#");
352  ROS_INFO("#");
353  ROS_INFO(" ###################### Frontier was -0.5, 6 exit");
354  ROS_INFO("#");
355  ROS_INFO("#");
356  makePlan();
357  return;
358  }
359 
360  // black list if we've made no progress for a long time
361  if (ros::Time::now() - last_progress_ > progress_timeout_) {
362  frontier_blacklist_.push_back(target_position);
363  ROS_INFO("#");
364  ROS_INFO("#");
365  ROS_INFO(" YYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY I WAITED TOO LONG!!!! Adding current goal to black list");
366  ROS_INFO("#");
367  ROS_INFO("#");
368  makePlan();
369  return;
370  }
371 
372  // we don't need to do anything if we still pursuing the same goal
373  if (same_goal) {
374  return;
375  }
376 
377 // Gauss_rauschen
378 
379 const double mean = 0.0;
380 const double stddev = 0.05;
381 //std::default_random_engine generator;
382 std::mt19937 generator(std::random_device{}());
383 
384 std::normal_distribution<double> dist(mean, stddev);
385  ROS_INFO("target_pos: x=%2.3f y=%2.3f", target_position.x, target_position.y);
386 
387 target_position.x=target_position.x+dist(generator);
388 target_position.y=target_position.y+dist(generator);
389  ROS_INFO("target_pos+noise: x=%2.3f y=%2.3f", target_position.x, target_position.y);
390 
391 
392  // send goal to move_base if we have something new to pursue
393  move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal goal;
394  goal.target_pose.pose.position = target_position;
395  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation.w = 1.;
396  goal.target_pose.header.frame_id = costmap_client_.getGlobalFrameID();
397  goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
398  move_base_client_.sendGoal(
399  goal, [this, target_position](
400  const actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState& status,
401  const move_base_msgs::MoveBaseResultConstPtr& result) {
402  reachedGoal(status, result, target_position);
403  });
404 }
405 
406 bool Explore::goalOnBlacklist(const geometry_msgs::Point& goal)
407 {
408  constexpr static size_t tolerace = 10; // default value = 5
409  costmap_2d::Costmap2D* costmap2d = costmap_client_.getCostmap();
410 
411  // check if a goal is on the blacklist for goals that we're pursuing
412  for (auto& frontier_goal : frontier_blacklist_) {
413  double x_diff = fabs(goal.x - frontier_goal.x);
414  double y_diff = fabs(goal.y - frontier_goal.y);
415 
416  if (x_diff < tolerace * costmap2d->getResolution() &&
417  y_diff < tolerace * costmap2d->getResolution())
418  return true;
419  }
420  return false;
421 }
422 
423 void Explore::reachedGoal(const actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState& status,
424  const move_base_msgs::MoveBaseResultConstPtr&,
425  const geometry_msgs::Point& frontier_goal)
426 {
427  ROS_DEBUG("Reached goal with status: %s", status.toString().c_str());
428  if (status == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::ABORTED) {
429  frontier_blacklist_.push_back(frontier_goal);
430  ROS_INFO("#");
431  ROS_INFO(" ZZZZZZ Reached goal aborted! Adding current goal to black list");
432  ROS_INFO("#");
433  }
434 
435  // find new goal immediatelly regardless of planning frequency.
436  // execute via timer to prevent dead lock in move_base_client (this is
437  // callback for sendGoal, which is called in makePlan). the timer must live
438  // until callback is executed.
439  oneshot_ = relative_nh_.createTimer(
440  ros::Duration(0, 0), [this](const ros::TimerEvent&) { makePlan(); },
441  true);
442 }
443 
444 void Explore::start()
445 {
446  exploring_timer_.start();
447 }
448 
449 void Explore::stop()
450 {
451  move_base_client_.cancelAllGoals();
452  exploring_timer_.stop();
453  ROS_INFO("Exploration stopped.");
454  ros::param::set("exploring" , false); // for bash script indication
455  ros::shutdown(); // von SOA Team
456 }
457 
458 } // namespace explore
459 
460 int main(int argc, char** argv)
461 {
462  ros::init(argc, argv, "explore");
463  if (ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME,
464  ros::console::levels::Info)) { //Debug
465  ros::console::notifyLoggerLevelsChanged();
466  }
467  explore::Explore explore;
468  ros::spin();
469 
470  return 0;
471 }
